section.p: This class captures information about the procedures a patient has undergone and will undergo in future.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] accessionId with data type String
Accession number of the procedure associated with this patient's notification. (composed of the procedure's abbreviated code, a four digit year and a sequential number).

Contains exactly one [1..1] datePerformed with data type Point In Time
The date on which the procedure was performed. Dates in the future may not be entered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRequired with data type Point In Time
The date used to determine that this procedure record is delinquent when a closed status has not been entered in the record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Contains the status of the procedure record.
Contains exactly one [1..1] performer, where its type is Primary Performer
Contains exactly one [1..1] procedure, where its type is Procedure

Contains zero or one [0..1] procedureResult, where its type is Womens Health Procedure Result
Indicates the procedure result after the procedure is done to a patient.
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedProcedure, where its type is Related Procedure

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentFacility, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The name of the health care facility where this procedure was performed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] accessionId with data type String
Accession number of the procedure associated with this patient's notification. (composed of the procedure's abbreviated code, a four digit year and a sequential number).

Contains exactly one [1..1] datePerformed with data type Point In Time
The date on which the procedure was performed. Dates in the future may not be entered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRequired with data type Point In Time
The date used to determine that this procedure record is delinquent when a closed status has not been entered in the record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Contains the status of the procedure record.
Contains exactly one [1..1] performer, where its type is Primary Performer
Contains exactly one [1..1] procedure, where its type is Procedure

Contains zero or one [0..1] procedureResult, where its type is Womens Health Procedure Result
Indicates the procedure result after the procedure is done to a patient.
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedProcedure, where its type is Related Procedure

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentFacility, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The name of the health care facility where this procedure was performed.
